name: Pyk
description:
Work In Progress. 

Current version 0.7.0.

This is my second game made in Godot (godotengine.org). It took me 6 weeks for now. I'm planning to work on it for next 3 weeks. For graphics I used Inkscape (https://inkscape.org/).

Progress
  • 8 enemies (out of 16)
  • 2 sceneries (out of 4)
  • Campaign 24 levels (out of 48)
  • Multi 18 maps (out of 48)
  • 2 terrain type (out of 4)

The game is totally free and contains no ads, paywalls or lootboxes.
